input: The sun is shining. The weather is sweet. Make you want to move your dancing feet.

The first sentence is "The sun is shining." The second sentence is "The weather is sweet." The third sentence is "Make you want to move your dancing feet." According to the input specification, the requirement is for the input to contain at least three sentences. Since there are exactly three sentences present in the input, it complies with the input specification.

No violation.
OK
